changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery) INSERT INTO details (company_id, order_id, operation_type) SELECT FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM companies) - 1) + 1), FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders) - 1) + 1), CASE WHEN s.sery % 4 = 0 THEN 'processing'::operation_type_enum WHEN s.sery % 3 = 0 THEN 'completed'::operation_type_enum ELSE 'created'::operation_type_enum END FROM series s ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
